name: Jazz Soul Night: Ella Blu
location: The Velvet Lounge, New York City, NY
short_description: An intimate evening with Ella Blu and her soulful jazz band.
long_description: Experience the smooth sounds of Ella Blu in an exclusive concert at The Velvet Lounge. With her soulful jazz band, Ella promises a night of enchanting melodies and heartwarming performances. Pre-show by The Sax Quartet.
